extendedInfo.description: Get the latest traffic reports for Portland, Oregon and SW Washington from KGW.com on your smartphone. The Portland Traffic application provides live speed maps, crash incident reports, ODOT traffic cameras for all major Metro routes, and the latest, lowest gas prices in the Metro Portland/Vancouver area, all on your phone. You can also submit traffic jam photos and video with the Portland Traffic smartphone app from KGW.com. Copyright 2011, KGW.com.

reviews.title: I use it daily!!
reviews.comment: I commute from Hillsboro to Vancouver and sometimes from Lloyd Center to Vancouver and the map tells me all I need to know! Green means no traffic, yellow is kinda slow, red is really creeping along and black is about dead stopped... Great to use if you are wondering if you should take the \"back way\" home... I can\'t praise this app enough!!
reviews.author: Miranda Tankersley

reviews.title: I give up
reviews.comment: I installed it - launched it - and got the traffic (map) screen. After ten minutes of trying everything I could think of - I have yet to find any menu or any way to get to any of the other supposed included screens. In addition, the map screen is just that - a map with no notes or traffic items of any kind showing on it. Easily the worst app I have ever downloaded.
reviews.author: Jim Hawley

reviews.title: Poor layout
reviews.comment: After several attempts, I finally figured out how to get to things beside the map.  You have to hit the back button.  Lame.  You need to have an X or something obvious to close a section.
reviews.author: Dwayne Dusky

reviews.title: Does as promised
reviews.comment: Anything that can give you bird eyes view of traffic and up to date traffic is awesome.
reviews.author: Nathaniel Maclaughlan

reviews.title: Solid traffic app
reviews.comment: Good solid quick & simple traffic app.
reviews.author: Sue Ann Saupe

reviews.title: GREAT TOOL
reviews.comment: I always double check to see if traffic is bad before I leave the house. The problem is to refresh it you ne to back out and click it again.
reviews.author: Jesus Echeverria

reviews.title: Helpful
reviews.comment: This app works great on my Droid Razor M
reviews.author: Mo B

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Helpful for getting around town checking traffic before you have to hit the road.

reviews.title: Ok

reviews.title: I Expect better!
reviews.comment: This app is mostly functional but navigation is clunky, odot cams are limited, and I am tired of business making crappy apps just to say they have one. Seriously put some real money behind this and make a better app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: not very good

reviews.title: This app
reviews.comment: Isn\'t helpful at all. I miss the traffic option on the where app. This never updates conditions.
